lead_paragraph: Gregor Mendel’s long lost manuscript on his pea-breeding experiments is the object of a tug of war between his relatives and the monastic order to which he belonged.
snippet: Gregor Mendel’s long lost manuscript on his pea-breeding experiments is the object of a tug of war between his relatives and the monastic order to which he belonged.

headline.main: A Family Feud Over Mendel’s Manuscript on the Laws of Heredity
headline.seo: A Family Feud Over Mendel’s Manuscript on Laws of Heredity
